thread.title: Multimillion-dollar verdict bittersweet for families of slain San Jose residents
thread.title_full: Multimillion-dollar verdict bittersweet for families of slain San Jose residents - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Multimillion-dollar verdict bittersweet for families of slain San Jose residents
text: It was a bittersweet moment for Dang Khoa Vo when an Alameda County jury recently returned a $13.7 million verdict against two trucking companies whose drivers were found negligent in the deaths of his mother and uncle in a 2012 crash. ...
